banner.official: An official website of the United States government

dropdown.officialDetails: website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.
dropdown.secureDetailsLockPostfix: or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.

death-of-a-loved-one.title: Death of a loved one
death-of-a-loved-one.summary: If you have lost a loved one, you may qualify for help, including assistance with burial or funeral costs, financial support, and more.
death-of-a-loved-one.secondaryHeadline: Government assistance after losing a loved one
death-of-a-loved-one.eligibilityCriteriaDescription: Please check the boxes and select the options that best describe your situation. Answer as many questions as possible for the most accurate results.

applicant.label: About you (the person applying for benefits)
